column2: "Mubosu afrɛ Nyankopɔn dzendzenndzen; Mekyerɛ Nyankopɔn na medze me ndze bɛfrɛ no
"Mo fona da mu mohwehwɛɛ EWURADZE: Me nsamu tseen anafua
column3: na ɔannwodow; Me kra poow dɛ obenya awerɛkyekyer."

column2: "Mekaa Nyankopɔn a
"Ɔwo na edze m’enyisoatsɛw mu ma osi pe: Mafona ma munntum mennkasa."
"Madwen tsetse nda no ho
"Mekaa m’adzesaa mu adwontow no: Modwendween mankasa m’akoma mu; Na mo sunsum hwehwɛɛ mu pɛsɛɛ."
"Aso EWURADZE bɔtow akyen daa? Aso ɔrennyɛ adom bio?"
"Aso no mbɔbɔrhu etwa mu kɔ kranana? Aso anohoba asa nwionn nwionn?"
"Aso Nyankopɔn no werɛ efir dɛ ɔbɛyɛ adom? Aso ɔdze ebufuw atow n’ayamuhyehye mu?"
"Nna mesee dɛ
column3: Iyi yɛ me awerɛhow; Na mbom mebɛkaa Ɔsorsornyi ne nsa nyimfa mfe no asesa."

column2: "Mobɔbɔ EWURADZE
column3: mebɛkaa wo ndzeyɛɛ akɛse no; Nyew

column2: "Eso mobɔdwendwen wo ndwuma nyinara ho
column3: Na mesina adwen wɔ wo ndzeyɛɛ ho."

column2: "Ao
column4: wo kwan wɔ ahotseweebea no mu: Woana na ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn kɛse dɛ ɔwo Nyankopɔn?"

column2: "Ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn a eyɛ anwanwadze: Ɔwo ama woehu w’ahoɔdzen wɔ aman mu."
"Ɔwo edze w’abasa agye wo man
"Esuesu no hun wo
column4: na wɔkoo awoo: Ebun so ho popoe."

column2: "Mununkum huee nsu gui; Wimu bobɔɔ mu: W’egyen menaba so fiir edzi."
"W’asenaman ne ndze wɔ ekyinmframa no mu; Enyinam no gyegyee wiadze do: Asaase ho popoe na ɔwosowee."
"Wo kwan daa po mu
column3: Na w’atsempɔn daa nsu akɛse no mu

column2: "Ɔwo enam Moses na Aaron nsa do Gyaa wo man dɛ mbowakuw."
